name: Wood
description:
Item: SCP-???? Special Containment Procedures: SCP-???? is to be stored in a reinforced steel containment vault at Site-??. Access requires Level 4 clearance and must be approved by O5 Command. Under no circumstances should SCP-???? be traded sold or mentioned in negotiations for any purpose. Upon interaction SCP-???? causes affected individuals to enter a state of transcendental delusion, perceiving the OSB as the rightful ruler of a parallel dimension known as "Boardtopia." They exhibit erratic behavior asserting their authority as "High Lords of Plywood" and initiating decrees demanding sacrifices of marshmallows and interpretive dance routines as tribute to the "Triangular Tyrant."

SCP-???? emanates a fluctuating aura of magnetic attraction causing nearby objects to develop personalities and engage in dramatic soliloquies about the futility of capitalism. Attempts to separate the subject from SCP-???? result in spontaneous manifestation of a mariachi band playing the "Macarena" while backup dancers dressed as cosmic beings protest the separation.
